title: (x) Six Million Dollar Man TV series opening titles - Eurostile Cond {Jan E}
content:

Please let me know if you have any ideas as to what typeface is being used in the opening title.

 [‹ (x) Squarish serif face found in Barbara Hahn portfolio - Melior {Rainer, Nick Cooke}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813212217/http:/typophile.com/node/35072 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) World's Straightest Driver sans - Metsys {Marten Fischer, Nick Cooke} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070813212217/http:/typophile.com/node/35067 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jdwelk

comments.content: Could be a squooched Eurostile Bold Condensed.
thank you, that will do nicely.
